item.title: The Internet’s Own Boy
item.description: I wasn’t aware that The Internet’s Own Boy: The Story of Aaron Swartz is now available with a Creative Common license, free for everyone to enjoy.
item.content:encoded: I wasn’t aware that The Internet’s Own Boy: The Story of Aaron Swartz is now available with a Creative Common license, free for everyone to enjoy.
